Class WriteCacheTimerTask

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.TimerTask
      • com.marklogic.semantics.sesame.client.WriteCacheTimerTask
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class WriteCacheTimerTask
extends java.util.TimerTask
    Timer implements write cache for efficient adding of triples
